summary: The Bundesgerichtshof   is the highest German court for civil and criminal law.
full_text: The Federal Court of Justice of Germany  in Karlsruhe is the highest court in the system of ordinary jurisdiction  in Germany. It is the supreme court  in all matters of criminal and private law. A decision handed down by the BGH can be reversed only by the Federal Constitutional Court of Germany in rare cases when the Constitutional Court rules on constitutionality .
title: Bundesgerichtshof
